verses.verse: At that time <S%H6256><s%> Merodach-baladan <S%H4757><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baladan <S%H1081><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> and a present <S%H4503><s%> to Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>; for he heard <S%H8085><s%> that he had been sick <S%H2470><s%>, and was recovered <S%H2388><s%>.

And Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> of them <S%H7200><s%>, and showed them the house <S%H1004><s%> of his precious things <S%H5238><s%>, the silver <S%H3701><s%>, and the gold <S%H2091><s%>, and the spices <S%H1314><s%>, and the precious <S%H2896><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his armor <S%H3627><s%>, and all that was found <S%H4672><s%> in his treasures <S%H214><s%>: there was nothing <S%H1697><s%> in his house <S%H1004><s%>, nor in all his dominion <S%H4475><s%>, that Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> showed them not <S%H7200><s%>.

Then came <S%H935><s%> Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> unto king <S%H4428><s%> Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, What said these men <S%H582><s%>? and from whence <S%H370><s%> came <S%H935><s%> they unto thee <S%H2396><s%>? And Hezekiah said <S%H559><s%>, They are come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> unto me <S%H894><s%>, even from Babylon.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he <S%H7200><s%>, What have they seen in thy house <S%H1004><s%>? And Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> answered <S%H559><s%>, All that is in my house <S%H1004><s%> have they seen <S%H7200><s%>: there is nothing <S%H1697><s%> among my treasures <S%H214><s%> that I have not showed them <S%H7200><s%>.
Then said <S%H559><s%> Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> to Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>:

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days are coming <S%H935><s%>, when all that is in thy house <S%H1004><s%>, and that which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> have laid up in store <S%H686><s%> until this day <S%H3117><s%>, shall be carried <S%H5375><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%>: nothing <S%H1697><s%> shall be left <S%H3498><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> that shall issue <S%H3318><s%> from thee <S%H3205><s%>, whom thou shalt beget, shall they take away <S%H3947><s%>; and they shall be eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> in the palace <S%H1964><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> unto Isaiah <S%H3470><s%>, Good <S%H2896><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> which thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>. He said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H7965><s%>, For there shall be peace and truth <S%H571><s%> in my days <S%H3117><s%>.
